description.value: For effects targeting creatures by type, this creature count as both their type and plants (whichever type allows an ability to affect them for abilities that affect only one type, and whichever is worse for abilities that affect both types). They also receive a +2 species bonus to saving throws against @UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.rules.Item.PqV3OCbUTyk2upPD]{Mind-affecting effects}, @UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.conditions.Item.NV4qXRDgb7zTNkW2]{Paralysis}, @UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.rules.JaRMioj4isNp7r1P.JournalEntryPage.ZaS9H4rwaFIQTUBC]{Poison}, polymorph, @UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.conditions.Item.3iTdt2NRgIyrychR]{Sleep}, and @UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.conditions.Item.CvsDp0GvojxiF2jz]{Stunning}, unless the effect specifies that it works against plants.

modifiers.name: Plantlike
modifiers.notes: For effects targeting creatures by type, cephalume count as both their type and plants (whichever type allows an ability to affect them for abilities that affect only one type, and whichever is worse for abilities that affect both types). They also receive a +2 species bonus to saving throws against mind-affecting effects, paralysis, poison, polymorph,  Sleep, and stunning, unless the effect specifies that it works against plants.
